bibl.title: Shared Sanctuaries and the Gods of Others: On the Meaning of 'Common' in Herodotus 8.144.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 53-57: the Hellenion at Naucratis as a panhellenic religious center (in the light of graffiti).
bibl.seg: Irene Polinskaya, Shared Sanctuaries and the Gods of Others: On the Meaning of 'Common' in Herodotus 8.144.
Ralph M. Rosen & Ineke Sluiter (edd.), Valuing Others in Classical Antiquity = Mnemosyne. Supplementum 323 (Leiden - Boston, 2010) pp. 43-70.
See in part. pp. 53-57: the Hellenion at Naucratis as a panhellenic religious center (in the light of graffiti).
